missing_log:
No valid log file path found in css_enhancer_config.json.

Please set it and restart.
log_not_found:
The log file 'console.log' was not found.

It has been created automatically.
no_modules:
No modules found in the 'modules' folder.

Place your .pyd modules inside and restart.
module_missing_on_new_log: Module {name} does not have 'on_new_log' function, skipping call.
no_on_new_log_modules: No modules with 'on_new_log' found, skipping log watcher.
update_http_fail: Could not check latest version. HTTP {code}
